patthana23.35:4.1: Nauppanno nakusalo dhammo uppannassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.35:4.2: Ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā cha, upanissaye satta.
patthana23.35:5.1: Nauppanno naakusalo dhammo uppannassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.35:5.2: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha, upanissaye cha.
patthana23.35:6.1: Naanupanno naabyākato dhammo uppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana23.35:7.1: Nauppanno naabyākato dhammo uppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.35:8.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā cattāri, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye satta … pe … avigate tīṇi.
